content: The Pinebrew Drink can be found at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain after completing Chapter 3 - The New West. Once you reach the first Shrine in Chapter 4, you can travel back to Black Wind Mountain and get the Drink from the Shen Monkey Vendor for 6,000 Will.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pinebrew.md', within the main section titled 'Pinebrew', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Pinebrew Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Pinebrew Drink can be found at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain after completing Chapter 3 - The New West. Once you reach the first Shrine in Chapter 4, you can travel back to Black Wind Mountain and get the Drink from the Shen Monkey Vendor for 6,000 Will.
